Name: Siranush
description:
Get to know Siranush, a hard-working farmer from Mkhchyan village. She lives there with her husband, 2 children (1 school-aged), and mother-in-law. Siranush hopes to save further money and give her kid a proper education.

The family owns 6 greenhouses, where they grow flowers and strawberries. With the help of her husband, Siranush delivers the flowers to local stores. This has been their main income source for many years and they put all their efforts into developing their agribusiness.

Having this in mind, Siranush applied for financial support. With the provided loan, she plans to pay for plowing and to purchase flower seeds.

This will surely help to increase the productivity levels so that the family's standard of living changes.
